Catalano.Imaging

Class FastBitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.FastBitmap

  • public class FastBitmap
extends java.lang.Object
    FastBitmap for manipulation of images.
    Author:
    Diego Catalano

      • isRGB

        public boolean isRGB()
        Verify RGB space color.
        Returns:
        True if is RGB, otherwise false.

      • isGrayscale

        public boolean isGrayscale()
        Verify Grayscale space color.
        Returns:
        True if is Grayscale, otherwise false.

      • toRGB

        public void toRGB()
        Convert any others space colors to RGB.

      • toGrayscale

        public void toGrayscale()
        Convert image to grayscale. This method will convert to Luminosity method.

      • indicateGrayscale

        public void indicateGrayscale(boolean indicate)
        Indicate image to grayscale. This method don't convert to grayscale image. Only indicate the property to grayscale, It's used to optimize some filters to avoid copy in the buffer.
        Parameters:
        indicate - True if need to indicate the image is grayscale, otherwise false.

      • toBitmap

        public Bitmap toBitmap()
        Convert FastBitmap to Bitmap.
        Returns:
        Bitmap.

      • recycle

        public void recycle()
        Recycle. Free the native object associated with this bitmap, and clear the reference to the pixel data. This will not free the pixel data synchronously; it simply allows it to be garbage collected if there are no other references.
